definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to put an end to/to annihilate/to cause to perish/to perish/annihilation (in quantum field theory)
to be shattered/to be annihilated (of hope, illusions etc)
to extinguish/to become extinct/to die out
to stop burning/to go out (of fire)/to die out/extinguished
to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the curative effect and safety of dibutyl phthalate on demodicidosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察灭蚴宁治疗蠕形螨病的效果及安全性。

sentences.english: Nirodha extinguishes all forms of clinging and attachment.
sentences.chinese: 灭消灭一切形式的执着和依恋。

sentences.english: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.chinese: 墙上插座的电线短路烧断了保险丝，电灯跟着灭了。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Jieyuan gel bait on killing Blattella germanica.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察洁园灭蟑饵剂现场杀灭德国小蠊的效果。

sentences.english: He who looks outside dreams, he who looks inside awakens.
sentences.chinese: 向外瞅的人在梦中，向内看的人苏醒灭。

sentences.english: With a flash, the kerosene lamp went out.
Along with interest in music comes a greater awareness of culture.
sentences.chinese: 伴随灭对音乐的亡味的是对白明更清晰的认识。

sentences.english: or how can I endure to see the destruction of my kindred?
sentences.chinese: 何忍见我同宗的人被灭呢。

sentences.english: The old days of corporate beneficence and loyalty to longtime employees are long gone.
sentences.chinese: 旧时企业对老员工的关怀和忠诚早就烟飞云灭了。

sentences.english: Is there anyone who should not have the inactivated pandemic vaccine?
sentences.chinese: 是否有任何人不应当接种大流行性流感灭活疫苗？

sentences.english: The Turks destroyed, he was with the Yuezhi united.
sentences.chinese: 突厥被灭，原是他与月氏联合。

sentences.english: And lightning strikes again and the lights go out.
sentences.chinese: 突然一道闪电打下来，灯全都灭了。

sentences.english: Thus this entire mass of suffering ceases.
Let the day perish wherein I was born, and the night in which it was said, There is a man child conceived.
sentences.chinese: 和说怀了男胎的那夜都灭没。

sentences.english: She makes sure her dealings are profitable; her lamp burns late into the night.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己的经营获利，她的灯终夜不灭。

sentences.english: The light went out and we were left in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 灯光灭了，剩下我们摸黑呆着。

definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
extermination of an entire family (ancient Chinese punishment)
to put (a criminal) to death/to punish
